name: Hawlucha
description: The Wrestling Pokémon. Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is not holding an item, it gains 10 feet to its speed.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)
